title: Lust Have Recipes, Aphrodisiac Cookbook
description: Author C. Nzingha Smith pens erotic, edible, art. Lust Have Recipes, Aphrodisiac Cookbook is an explosion of potent ingredients intricately mixed to create libido enhancing meals & drinks. Sexy mouth watering aphrodisiac recipes, including Deep In, Fingered & The “G” Spot pair perfectly with sensual/erotic poetry and sex tips to promote overall sexual health & intimate romance. Sex starts in the kitchen, where the fire is kindled for lasting heated passion. Learn to prepare meals, develop better cooking skills & presentation, enhanced bedroom performance & improved quality of life. “Lust Have Recipes, Aphrodisiac Cookbook is a Fifty Shades 2.0 for lovers and foodies alike, nothing like you’ve ever read!” Allon Magazine
author: C. Nzingha Smith
